# The scource files are uncommented for the Productionized run (Remove the `#` when troubleshooting these scripts)

#VEHICLE_H = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/@VEHICLE_H.parquet', format='parquet')
#VEHICLE_H.createOrReplaceTempView("VEHICLE_H")

#dboMFRHistoryDaily = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboMFRHistoryDaily.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboMFRHistoryDaily.createOrReplaceTempView("dboMFRHistoryDaily")
## Start of QView scripting translated over to MSSQL for table DIM_MFR

SAP_MFR = spark.sql(""" 
SELECT 
        LEFT(U_FLEET,1) AS MFRHorse
        ,if(U_ACTIVE='I','In Service',
         if(U_ACTIVE='R','Removed From Fleet',
         if(U_ACTIVE='W','Parked Off - Workshop',
         if(U_ACTIVE='D','Parked Off - Depot','NULL')))) AS MFRVehicleStatus
         ,U_BRANCH as MFRBranch
         ,U_MODEL as MFRModel
         ,U_EQUIPMENT as MFREquipment
         ,U_CHASSIS as MFRChassisNumber
         ,U_COLOUR as MFRVehicleColour
         ,U_ENGINE as MFREngineNumber
         ,U_APPLICATION as MFRApplication
         ,U_DIVISION as MFRDivision
         ,U_TYRE_SIZE as MFRRecommendedTyreSize
         ,U_TYRE_ALT_SIZE as MFRAlternativeTyreSize
         ,U_DEPOTCODE as MFRDepotCode
         ,U_LICENSE as MFRExpiryDateOnLicence
         ,U_LICENSE_FEE as MFRLicenceFee
         ,U_GVM as MFRGrossVehicleMass
         ,U_TARE as MFRTareWeight
         ,U_PAYLOAD as MFRPayload
         ,U_PCARRIER as MFRPeopleCarrier
         ,U_TYRE_NO as MFRTotalNoOfTyres
         ,U_TYRES_STEERING as MFRNoOfSteeringAxleTyres
         ,U_TYRES_REAR as MFRNoOfRearAxleTyres
         ,U_EXT_LENGTH as `MFRExternalBodyLength_M`
         ,U_FLEET as MFRFleetNo
         ,U_EXT_WIDTH as `MFRExternalBodyWidth_M`
         ,U_EXT_HEIGHT as `MFRExternalBodyHeight_M`
         ,U_INT_LENGTH as `MFRInternalBodyLength_M`
         ,U_INT_WIDTH as `MFRInternalBodyWidth_M`
         ,U_INT_HEIGHT as `MFRInternalBodyHeight_M`
         ,U_INT_VOLUME as MFRInternalVolumetricCapacity
         ,U_BODY_MAKE as MFRMakeOfBody
         ,U_ADVERTISING as MFRAvailbilityForAdvertising
         ,U_CURRENT_AD as MFRAdvertisingOrSignwritingOn
         ,U_FLEXIMOUNTS as MFRFrameworkInstalledForFlexiMount
         ,U_CLASS as `MFRCcClass/TypeOfVehicle`
         ,U_FUEL_TYPE as `MFRDiesel/Petrol`
         ,U_FUEL_L as MFRTankCapacity
         ,U_RANGE as MFRKMRangeOnFullTankFuel
         ,U_TARGET_FUEL as MFRTargetConsumption
         ,U_CONSUMPTION as `MFRKMs/Litre`
         ,U_SPEEDGOVERNING as `MFREngineProtection/IdleRevs`
         ,U_FINANCE as MFROriginalFinanceCompany
         ,U_CONTRACT as MFRContractNumber
         ,U_REG as MFRRegNo
         ,U_CONTRACT_START as MFRContractStartDate
         ,U_CONTRACT_END as MFRContractEndDate
         ,U_FIRST_INSTALMENT as MFRFirstInstalmentDate
         ,U_PREVIOUS_OWNERSHIP as MFRPreviousOwnershipOfVehicle
         ,U_FLEET_HAUL_NO as MFRFleetHaulNumber
         ,U_OLD_REG as MFROldRegNo
         ,U_E_TOLL as MFRETollClass
         ,U_STATUS as MFRAssetStatus
         ,U_YEAR as MFRYearModel
         ,U_MAKE as MFRMake
         ,U_SERIES as MFRSeries
         ,U_PT_NAME as MFRPTName
         ,U_ASSET_NO as MFRAssetCode
         ,U_VEHICLE_FINANCED as MFRVehicleFinanced
         ,U_REG_CHANGED as MFRHasRegChanged
         ,U_BACK_DOOR_WIDTH as MFRBackDoorWidth
         ,U_BACK_DOOR_HEIGHT as MFRBackDoorHeight
    FROM VEHICLE_H
""")
#SAP_MFR.show
SAP_MFR.createOrReplaceTempView("SAP_MFR")

SAP_MFR_HISTORY = spark.sql(""" 
SELECT 
	 `FleetCode`		as  MFRFleetNo,
	 `Depot`			as `MFRCurrentDepotCode`,
	 `DailyDate`	    as `MFRLocationDate`,
	 `ChangeDate`		as `MFRBelongsDateFrom`,
	 `ChangeDateTo`		as `MFRBelongsDateTo`
FROM dboMFRHistoryDaily
""")
#SAP_MFR_HISTORY.show
SAP_MFR_HISTORY.createOrReplaceTempView("SAP_MFR_HISTORY")

HISTORY_JOIN = spark.sql("""
SELECT 
      concat(CAST(unix_timestamp(MFRLocationDate) / (24*60*60) + 25569 as int ), CAST(sm.MFRFleetNo as string)) AS MFRLocationKey,
       MFRCurrentDepotCode,
       MFRLocationDate,
       MFRBelongsDateFrom,
       MFRBelongsDateTo,
       smh.*
FROM SAP_MFR_HISTORY sm
LEFT JOIN SAP_MFR smh 
ON sm.MFRFleetNo = smh.MFRFleetNo
""")
#HISTORY_JOIN.show()
HISTORY_JOIN.createOrReplaceTempView("HISTORY_JOIN")
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
## Write success message for production script
